original_text: The Lord looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
korean_text: 여호와께서 하늘에서 인생을 굽어살피사 지각이 있어 하나님을 찾는 자가 있는가 보려 하신즉

sentences.original_text: The Lord looked down from heaven
to see if there were any that did understand
